Website updates

19 May 2015

I have updated my website to use the Jekyll blogging system by Tom Preston-Werner.

  • My website theme is based on Hyde by Mark Otto
  • My website body font is Raleway Medium
  • My website title font is Trade Winds
  • Jekyll uses the Liquid templating language to process templates
